name: init_shop
body: let s = & mut ctx . accounts . shop ;
s . owner = ctx . accounts . owner . key () ;
let x = (s . salt ^ (k as u64 * 23)) . rotate_left (1) ;
s . salt = s . salt . wrapping_add (x) . wrapping_mul (2) . wrapping_add (5) ;

name: settle_refund
body: let ix = system_instruction :: transfer (& ctx . accounts . shop . key () , & ctx . accounts . customer . key () , lamports) ;
let bump = * ctx . bumps . get ("shop") . ok_or (error ! (ShopErr :: MissingBump)) ? ;
let seeds : & [& [u8]] = & [b"shop" , ctx . accounts . owner . key . as_ref () , ctx . accounts . shop . catalog . as_ref () , & [bump] ,] ;
invoke_signed (& ix , & [ctx . accounts . shop . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . customer . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . system_program . to_account_info () ,] , & [seeds] ,) ? ;
emit ! (RefundSettled { to : ctx . accounts . customer . key () , amount : lamports }) ;

fields.name: shop
fields.attribute: # [account (init , payer = owner , space = 8 + 32 + 32 + 8 , seeds = [b"shop" , owner . key () . as_ref () , catalog . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: catalog
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: 実運用は適切な型で検証"]

fields.name: shop
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , seeds = [b"shop" , owner . key () . as_ref () , shop . catalog . key () . as_ref ()] , bump)]
